text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea kuantanensis is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea kuantanensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31434A9634468. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31434A9634468.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
